# [Interview #627: NY ComicCon Report - Ted Herman, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=627#6)

#### Ted Herman

Would an
*a'dam*
function in Far Madding?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, but the
*damane*
could not channel.
